Interface ErrorDiffusionDitherStrategy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DitherStrategy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtkinsonDitherStrategy, BurkesDitherStrategy, FloydSteinbergDitherStrategy, JarvisJudiceNinkeDitherStrategy, LowErrorAtkinsonDitherStrategy, NoDitherStrategy, SierraFilterLightStrategy, StuckiDitherStrategy

    public interface ErrorDiffusionDitherStrategy
extends DitherStrategy
    Interface for error diffusion strategies

      void distributeError(java.awt.image.BufferedImage output, int oldPixel, int newPixel, int x, int y, java.lang.Integer boundX, java.lang.Integer boundY)
      Distributes the error on the output image at the given x,y, using the difference between the original (old) pixel and the new pixel.
